name: Suitizen
description: Suicitizens is not just another memecoin. It's a vibrant community of crypto enthusiasts who know how to have fun while making profits. Deployed on the cutting-edge Sui blockchain, Suicitizens is designed to be both engaging and rewarding, with unique tokenomics that ensure holders are incentivized for their participation. Whether you're a meme lover, a crypto investor, or just looking for a good time, Suicitizens is the project for you. Total token supply is 1,000,000,000. Top $STZ holders will get guaranteed WL allocation for Suicitizens NFT! Community members can earn $STZ by contributing to project development, and partaking in marketing campaigns. The nft project is a free mint project of 777 unique first generation nfts for our community members. Holding a minimum amount of tokens will qualify members for the free mint, during giveaway campaigns. Holders can also stake tokens to qualify for free mint. Benefits of holding the nft includes access to gamefi economy, exclusive access to tools and incentives from partners. Holders may be eligible for airdrops in the future
